alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 3:04PM CDT until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Pickens and Sumter Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 65.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 74.2 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
